name: Range 62
desc: Located on the east side of R-4806. The majority of the targets are located in and around Dogbone Lake. The targets include nuclear bomb circles and tactical targets consisting of an airfield, supply area, anti-aircraft artillery, convoys, and a surface-to-air missile site.

name: Small Town Square With Airport Mock-up
entry: West (Alamo Charlie), keep above 8000 feet MSL in transition.
desc: Only inert or training ordinance is allowed in this area.

name: Convoy Targets
desc: Targets consist of light armored ground units. Only inert or training ordinance is allowed in this area.

name: Military Compound Targets
desc: Targets consist of armored ground units and buildings. Only inert or training ordinance is allowed in this area.
